meanings.definition: A plant of the borage family with spotted leaves and pink or blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The lungwort in the garden has beautiful pink flowers.
meanings.sent2: I spotted some lungwort with blue flowers in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The lungwort plant looked like it was wearing polka-dotted leaves.
meanings.sent4: The lungwort's spotted leaves are like nature's own artwork.
meanings.sent5: The pink flowers of the lungwort brightened up the shady area.

meanings.definition: A plant used in herbal medicine for treating lung ailments.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother brewed a tea with lungwort to help her breathing.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist recommended lungwort for my cough.
meanings.sent3: The lungwort plant whispered to the lungs, 'Breathe easy.'
meanings.sent4: Using lungwort felt like giving my lungs a soothing hug.
meanings.sent5: The lungwort's healing properties made it a valuable herb for lung health.
